articles.description: India News: BHUBANESWAR: For the first time since he became the CM of Odisha, Naveen Patnaik asked his entire council of ministers to resign ahead of Sunday’s maj.

articles.title: रूस के एंटी एयरक्राफ्ट सिस्टम दुश्मनों को पागलों की तरह कुचल रहे... यूक्रेन युद्ध पर पुतिन की हुंकार
articles.description: रूस की सरकारी आरआईए समाचार एजेंसी के अनुसार, पुतिन ने शनिवार को प्रसारित एक इंटरव्यू में रूस-यूक्रेन युद्ध को लेकर कई बातें कही। उन्होंने यूक्रेन को अमेरिकी हथियारों की आपूर्ति को लेकर किए गए प्रश्न का जवाब देते हुए कहा कि रूस आसानी से मुकाबला कर रहा था और पह…

articles.author: Sruthy Susan Ullas,Sanika Athavale
articles.title: Dissolving committee is an eyewash, restore old books, says activists & writers
articles.description: Activists, educationists, writers and students, who have been opposing the revised textbooks, on Saturday termed the process of dissolving the Rohith Chakrathirtha Committee an "eyewash" and stuck to to their demand of getting the old textbooks restored.

articles.author: Farheen Hussain
articles.title: Rise in brain fog cases in Covid survivors
articles.description: Inability to focus on small tasks and worsening brain fog, making remembering little details a Herculean task, are indications of the effects of "long Covid", as per research papers from around the world.

articles.author: Malathy Iyer
articles.title: No alarm as surge in cases in city & state still driven by Omicron variant
articles.description: The state public health department's surveillance officer Dr Pradip Awate reminded on Saturday that Delhi too had seen a rapid rise in Covid cases in April, but the daily caseload is now back to three digits.

articles.author: Richa Pinto
articles.title: August Kranti to get a makeover in 80th year of Quit India movement
articles.description: South Mumbai's historic August Kranti Maidan was where Mahatma Gandhi had given the call for the Quit India movement on August 8, 1942. Eighty years on, a fortnight ago, the BMC began to revamp the space and is looking at unifying its grounds currently separa…

articles.author: Swati Deshpande
articles.title: Oral consent can't trump contract: Bombay HC
articles.description: Bombay high court recently held that a written agreement between a builder and a buyer cannot be substituted by a subsequent oral understanding.

articles.author: P Vasantha Kumar
articles.title: Injuries also can hit income, says K’taka HC
articles.description: Awarding more than ₹6.1 lakh compensation to petitioner Abdul from Hubballi, the Dharwad bench of the Karnataka HC said that in accident cases, linking the 'loss of future prospects' only to disability arising from amputation defies logic. "Loss of income can…

articles.title: GPO gets a makeover, dome to be illuminated
articles.description: In a city where most historic buildings lie in anguished disrepair, a glorious gem will soon reveal itself. The 110-year-old Mumbai General Post Office (GPO) is in the midst of a massive makeover which will conclude with the illumination of the dome that is t…

articles.author: Malathy Iyer,Richa Pinto
articles.title: To boost drive, BMC starts door-to-door campaign for kids
articles.description: In an attempt to boost the uptake of the precautionary dose as well as vaccination rates among the 12 to 17 age-group, the Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation or BMC has launched the 'Har Ghar Dastak' campaign from June 1.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: 'CM should've heard opposing views'
articles.description: Baraguru Ramachandrappa, the chairman of the previous textbook revision committee, said chief minister Basavaraj Bommai should have called the opposing stakeholders for a meeting, instead of following the minister's report.

articles.title: विश्व पर्यावरण दिवस पर जानिए दिल्ली में प्रदूषण का हाल, हवा में बढ़ती ओजोन गैस ने दे दी नई टेंशन

articles.description: The information and broadcasting ministry on Saturday directed a TV channel and social media giants Twitter and YouTube to pull down from their platforms the “derogatory and obscene” advertisements of a deodorant brand, Layer’r Shot. Several social media user…

articles.content:
